english.segment1: Just to see your face and touch the healer's hand. Desperate, I push through the crowd. If I could touch your clothes. I could feel your power
english.segment3: Please look. And notice me. Just to release my pain. Just to know your name
english.segment4: Come my way I'm out of touch. I'm out of reach. I've got the faith to believe. Am I out of touch or out of reach. What would it take for you to walk towards me
english.segment5: I'm out of touch, out of reach. But I'm running towards you and it's all I believe
